REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0852 reute d f BC-BIOMET-<BMET>-3RD-QTR 03-12 0045

TEXT.TITLE: BIOMET <BMET> 3RD QTR REVENUES RISE
TEXT.BODY: Biomet Inc said its revenues for the third quarter ended February 28 were up 21 pct to 14.1 mln dlrs from 11.7 mln dlrs and nine month revenues were up 25 pct to 39.7 mln dlrs from 31.8 mln dlrs a year before. Reuter
